name: The Puppet Master (itch) (Antti Eronen)
description:
"Are you making your own choices... or are you just blindly following a path laid out in front of you by someone else?"

You wake up in a cyborg body. You have no knowledge of who you are or how you ended up here - but you're holding a handgun. The weapon is pointed at a man with a bionic arm. And he begins to talk to you about who you truly are...

From here starts The Puppet Master, a dark cyberpunk visual novel about memories, identity, and the freedom of choice.

Approximate playtime (per playthrough): 30 minutes.

***

"The Puppet Master" is a one-man project made for the "TyranoBuilder Summer Game Jam" by the Finnish novelist Antti Eronen, who has thus far published three Science Fiction books in his career.

The game is free to download, but the author is also accepting modest compensations (of about 1$) for his hard work!

NOTE: The game will ONLY play windowed at a fixed 960x640 resolution - full screen support is not available!

The developer's blog (in Finnish) can be read at:

http://anttieronen.blogspot.fi/

Comments on Facebook are also warmly welcome:

https://www.facebook.com/Antti-Eronen-197017470366...
